name: places/ChIJAQD8eJZYwokRzOBvFwnV554
formattedAddress: 1046 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1046 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: I happened upon this little shoe store when I was in the neighborhood several years back and couldn't resist trying on a pair of hikers. The shoes were incredibly well made and comfortable, but I was also impressed with how attentive and unpretentious the staff were. They helped me with multiple styles and sizes, but also gave me plenty of time to decide- no high pressure sales! I recently took those hikers to London and walked over 9 miles/day for 4 days straight. My legs were ready to give out on me by the fourth day but my feet felt great and stayed cozy and dry! I was truly amazed with how well these shoes performed. It's so worth investing in well made shoes and these are the bomb!

originalText.text: A hidden gem amongst the big luxury brands on Madison Ave. Love the “Kate” shoes I got. Been wearing them almost daily. Very comfy, no blisters! The staff shows you how flexible and bendable their shoes are. Amazing.

text.text: A hidden gem amongst the big luxury brands on Madison Ave. Love the “Kate” shoes I got. Been wearing them almost daily. Very comfy, no blisters! The staff shows you how flexible and bendable their shoes are. Amazing.

originalText.text: Wow! Talk about an authentic Italian shoe store! If you are like me and love a unique shopping experience...and stylish, handmade shoes...I strongly recommend Lukure in NYC. Great quality and the salesperson was extremely attentive. Very happy with the comfort and look of the shoes I purchased. They had a few bags too. Was not in the market for one, but they did catch my eye as well. I’m definitely coming back.

text.text: Wow! Talk about an authentic Italian shoe store! If you are like me and love a unique shopping experience...and stylish, handmade shoes...I strongly recommend Lukure in NYC. Great quality and the salesperson was extremely attentive. Very happy with the comfort and look of the shoes I purchased. They had a few bags too. Was not in the market for one, but they did catch my eye as well. I’m definitely coming back.

originalText.text:
I was walking with my wife recently and happened upon Lukure. If there is one area where I allow myself
a luxury, it s my shoes. My wife is from Italy and we travel there often and as a result I buy most of my shoes there. I usually go for Bruno Magli or Pollini shoes. Lukure shoes caught my eye , and the staff was helpful so I thought I d give them a try. The manager explained where the shoes were made, the selected leathers , and how thier shoes are ergonomically designed, to be honest I was skeptical at first. But when I tried them on , I was pretty amazed. They were as comfortable as any other pair of shoes I had bought and looked very cool. I m accustomed to more classic designs , but these shoes had a classic yet contemporary appeal. I bought the Vaughn style and Charles. I know the shoes are not for everyone , they can run a bit pricey but if i m going to  be walking around in a pair of shoes all day  I want them to look good and feel better...these shoes really fit the bill. I m considering having the made to order s next ....I ve had the pair a few weeks now and I can’t count how many people have commented on my shoes .highly recommend.

originalText.text: I love my Lukure sandals and loafers. The most comfortable and beautiful.
